headline: Assessing Corpay (CPAY) Valuation After New Multi Year Sports Payment Partnerships
summary: Sports partnerships bring Corpay (CPAY) into focus Corpay (CPAY) has been expanding its presence in global sports, with its Cross Border business recently signing or extending multi year foreign exchange and payments partnerships across golf, rugby, and motorcycle racing. For investors, these agreements with LIV Golf, Rugby Australia, and Pramac Racing highlight how Corpay’s cross border solutions are being adopted by large, internationally active organizations that face regular foreign...
